created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the skill was created.

display_title.description: Display title for the skill. This is a human-readable label that is not included in the prompt sent to the model.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skill. The format and length of IDs may change over time.

latest_version.description: The latest version identifier for the skill. This represents the most recent version of the skill that has been created.

source.description: Source of the skill. This may be one of the following values: 'custom' (the skill was created by a user), 'anthropic' (the skill was created by Anthropic).

type.description: Object type. For Skills, this is always 'skill'.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the skill was last updated.
